productShortDescription: T-shirt from the ARISE collection. The tee features supercontinent Pangea on the front and has a quote on the back saying "Don't let distance become the boundary for our love.". The shirt is made of 100% high quality cotton and is slightly fitted. The item has a seamless 2.2 cm ribbed collar.
